ns9:component-version-script.description: Configure repo and install Apache server
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
yum --nogpgcheck -y clean all yum --nogpgcheck -y install httpd
# Ports on which to listen sed -ie "s/^Listen .*/Listen $http_port\nListen $http_proxy_port/g" /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf
# set up auto-start on booting chkconfig httpd on

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then echo "Adding static site configuration on port $http_port"
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF
<VirtualHost *:$http_port> DocumentRoot /var/www/html ServerName localhost </VirtualHost>
EOF
# Copy the default index page into place cp /var/www/error/noindex.html /var/www/html/index.html fi
if [ ! "$http_node_ips" == "None" ]; then SUBSTR=""
if [ "$use_ajp" == "YES" ]; then for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember ajp://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer ajp config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass /$ajp_proxy_context balancer://mycluster/$tomcat_context </VirtualHost>
EOF else for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember http://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer config: "$SUBSTR
COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="" STICKY_SESSION_NAME="JSESSIONID|jsessionid" if [ "$autogen_sticky_cookie" == "YES" ]; then STICKY_SESSION_NAME="ROUTEID" COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="Header add Set-Cookie \"ROUTEID=.%{BALANCER_WORKER_ROUTE}e; path=/\" env=BALANCER_ROUTE_CHANGED" fi
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass / balancer://mycluster/ stickysession=$STICKY_SESSION_NAME nofailover=On ProxyPassReverse / balancer://mycluster/ ProxyPreserveHost On $COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE </VirtualHost>
EOF fi
else echo "Proxy load balancer disabled" fi

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

supported-os-details.exec-script: trap "APPDEXITSTATUS=\$?;printenv > $2;exit $APPDEXITSTATUS" EXIT # Execute action script source $1 APPDRETURNSTATUS=$? # Unset trap trap - EXIT # Save env variables in output properties file printenv > $2 exit $APPDRETURNSTATUS

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Start Apache server UPDATE on http_port, http_proxy_port, and/or http_node_port."
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Remove all the settings and set up with the new properits values. CONF_FILE="/etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf" LINE_NUM=`grep -n "^<VirtualHost .*" ${CONF_FILE} | sed -n 's/^\([0-9]*\)[:].*/\1/p' | sed -n '1p'` if [ ! ${LINE_NUM} == "" ]; then sed -ie "${LINE_NUM},\$"'d' ${CONF_FILE} fi
# Start re-configuration if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then echo "Adding static site configuration on port $http_port"
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF
<VirtualHost *:$http_port> DocumentRoot /var/www/html ServerName localhost </VirtualHost>
EOF
fi
if [ ! "$http_node_ips" == "None" ]; then SUBSTR=""
if [ "$use_ajp" == "YES" ]; then for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember ajp://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer ajp config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass /$ajp_proxy_context balancer://mycluster/$tomcat_context </VirtualHost>
EOF else for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember http://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer config: "$SUBSTR
COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="" STICKY_SESSION_NAME="JSESSIONID|jsessionid" if [ "$autogen_sticky_cookie" == "YES" ]; then STICKY_SESSION_NAME="ROUTEID" COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="Header add Set-Cookie \"ROUTEID=.%{BALANCER_WORKER_ROUTE}e; path=/\" env=BALANCER_ROUTE_CHANGED" fi
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass / balancer://mycluster/ stickysession=$STICKY_SESSION_NAME nofailover=On ProxyPassReverse / balancer://mycluster/ ProxyPreserveHost On $COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE </VirtualHost>
EOF fi
else echo "Proxy load balancer disabled" fi
# restart httpd service service httpd restart
echo "Finished Apache server UPDATE"

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
set -e
#tmp staging dir for setting up installer export INSTALL_PATH="/tmp/vmware/HQ"
LOG_FILE=/tmp/appdirector-agent.log
echo "Start Hyperic Agent configuration. " >> ${LOG_FILE}
HQ_AGENT_INSTALL_DIR=/home/hyperic/ # Hyperic agent home, e.g "/home/hyperic/hyperic-hq-agent-4.6.0" HQ_AGENT_HOME=`find ${HQ_AGENT_INSTALL_DIR} -name "hyperic-hqee-agent*"` HQ_AGENT_PROPS=${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/agent.properties
if [ "x${HQ_AGENT_PORT}" != "x" ] ; then
HQ_AGENT_PORT=${HQ_AGENT_PORT} else
HQ_AGENT_PORT=2144 fi
if [ "x${HQ_SERVER_IP}" != "x" ] ; then
HQ_SERVER_IP=${HQ_SERVER_IP} fi
echo "Start to write Hyperic property file." >> ${LOG_FILE}
echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.agent.server.AgentDListProvider=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.agent.server.MeasurementSchedule=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.layout.ConversionPattern=%d %-5p [%t] [%c{1}] %m%n" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.measurement.agent.server.SenderThread=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.apache.http=ERROR" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.File=${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/log/agent.log" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.category.org.apache.axis=ERROR" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.MaxBackupIndex=1" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "autoinventory.runtimeScan.interval.millis=86400000" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.product.pluginxml=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.MaxFileSize=5000KB" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "agent.logLevel.SystemOut=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.util.units=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate=ERROR" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.rootLogger=INFO, R" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "agent.logFile=${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/log/agent.log" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS}
# Approve Platform echo "# Approve Platform" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "platform = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
# Approve MySQL echo "# Approve MySQL" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.0.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.0.x.jdbcUser = ${HQ_MySQL_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.0.x.jdbcPassword = ${HQ_MySQL_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.1.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.1.x.jdbcUser = ${HQ_MySQL_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.1.x.jdbcPassword = ${HQ_MySQL_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
# Approve Postgres echo "# Approve Postgres" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x.postgresql.user = ${HQ_Postgres_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x.postgresql.pass = ${HQ_Postgres_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x.postgresql.program = ${HQ_Postgres_home}/bin/" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x.postgresql.user = ${HQ_Postgres_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x.postgresql.pass = ${HQ_Postgres_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x.postgresql.program = ${HQ_Postgres_home}/bin/" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
# Approve Tomcat echo "# Approve Tomcat" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0.jmx.username = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0.jmx.password = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0.jmx.url = service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://localhost:${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_port}/jmxrmi" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0.jmx.username = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0.jmx.password = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0.jmx.url = service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://localhost:${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_port}/jmxrmi" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
# Approve JBoss echo "# Approve JBoss" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "JBoss\ 5.1 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
# Approve TC Server echo "# Approve TC Server" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "SpringSource\ tc\ Runtime\ 7.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "SpringSource\ tc\ Runtime\ 6.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
# Approve Apache echo "# Approve Apache" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ httpd = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
if [ -d ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/data ]; then echo "rm -fR ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/data" >> ${LOG_FILE} rm -fR ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/data fi
echo "Start Hyperic Agent." >> ${LOG_FILE} ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/bin/hq-agent.sh start &>/tmp/agent.startup.log
if grep -q Failure /tmp/agent.startup.log; then echo "Failed to start Hyperic Agent." >> ${LOG_FILE} exit 1 else echo "Hyperic Agent Started." >> ${LOG_FILE} fi

With its ability to continuously monitor 50,000 metrics across 75 web technologies, Hyperic provides sysadmins the deep visibility they need to ensure server performance, reduce downtime, and meet SLAs. Hyperic automatically discovers new virtual machines as they come online, eliminating the need for manual updating of monitoring configurations.

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
# import global configuration. . $global_conf
# exit on any error. set -e
# set common path. export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
# set the log file. log_file=/tmp/appdirector-server.log
# only install bc on CentOS. if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'CentOS' ]; then /usr/bin/yum install bc -y 2> >(egrep -v "ftp error|fetch via http|rpmts_HdrFromFdno" >&2) fi
# temporary staging folder for setting up the installer staging_dir="/tmp/vmware/HQ" staging_dir_pkg="$staging_dir/pkg" staging_hq_package="hq_src.tar.gz"
echo "executing hq server installation service" >> $log_file echo "~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~" >> $log_file
echo "creating the installation staging directory: $staging_dir_pkg" >> $log_file mkdir -p $staging_dir_pkg
echo "moving the installation package to the staging directory: $hq_package > $staging_dir_pkg/$staging_hq_package" >> $log_file mv $hq_package $staging_dir_pkg/$staging_hq_package
echo "extracting the installation package to $staging_dir" >> $log_file tar -xvzf $staging_dir_pkg/$staging_hq_package -C $staging_dir
echo "encryption the OS user password" >> $log_file hq_os_user_pass_enc=`openssl passwd -crypt $hq_os_user_pass`
# add a new user if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Ubuntu does not use the wheel group, so don't try to add the user to it /usr/sbin/useradd -G root,sys,bin,daemon,adm,disk -d /home/hyperic -s /bin/bash -p $hq_os_user_pass_enc $hq_os_user_name else /usr/sbin/useradd -G root,wheel,sys,bin,daemon,adm,disk -d /home/hyperic -s /bin/bash -p $hq_os_user_pass_enc $hq_os_user_name fi
# determine the name of the extracted server installation folder. hq_installer_path=`find $staging_dir -name "hyperic-hqee-installer*"`
setup_script=$hq_installer_path/setup.sh hq_server_install_script=$staging_dir/hq_install.sh mkdir -p $hq_server_install_dir chmod 777 -R $hq_server_install_dir chmod 777 -R $staging_dir
echo "configuring the server..." >> $log_file
# set the JAVA_HOME. echo "export JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/jre-vmware/" > $hq_server_install_script
baseurl="http\://$ip_address\:$hq_server_port/"
HQ_CONFIG_FILE=$staging_dir/hq-server-install.conf
cat > $HQ_CONFIG_FILE << HQCONFIG server.database.choice=HQ Built-in Database server.database-driver=org.postgresql.Driver server.database.create=Yes server.encryption-key=vmwaredatabase server.database-password=hqadmin server.installdir=$hq_server_install_dir server.mail.sender=$hq_server_email_address server.database-user=hqadmin server.hibernate.dialect=org.hyperic.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQLDialect server.admin.password=$hq_admin_pass server.keystore.path=../../conf/hyperic.keystore server.admin.username=$hq_admin_user server.overwrite=Yes server.admin.email=$hq_server_email_address server.database.upgrade.choice=Overwrite the HQ server database (ERASE all existing data) server.webapp.baseurl=$baseurl server.webapp.port=$hq_server_port server.use.custom.keystore=No using.builtin.db=true server.connection-validation-sql=select 1 server.mail.host=$hq_server_mail_hostname server.database=PostgreSQL server.multicast.addr=227.0.0.1 server.postgresql.port=9432 server.multicast.port=3030 server.quartzDelegate=org.quartz.impl.jdbcjobstore.PostgreSQLDelegate server.database-password-encrypted=ENC(/kCSlPtxdqmxqHM0WYdxvw\=\=) server.webapp.secure.port=$hq_server_secure_port accept.unverified.certificates=false server.database-url=jdbc\:postgresql\://127.0.0.1\:9432/hqdb?protocolVersion\=2 server.keystore.password=hyperic server.ha.bind_addr=*.* HQCONFIG
echo "$setup_script $HQ_CONFIG_FILE" >> $hq_server_install_script
TUNE_OS_SCRIPT=`/usr/bin/find $hq_installer_path -name "tune-os.sh"` echo "Executing $TUNE_OS_SCRIPT" >> $log_file "$TUNE_OS_SCRIPT" 2>&1 | tee -a $log_file
chmod 755 $hq_server_install_script su - $hq_os_user_name -c "$hq_server_install_script" 2> >(egrep -v "reset" >&2) 2>&1 | tee -a $log_file
echo "starting HQ server" HQ_SERVER_SCRIPT=`/usr/bin/find $hq_server_install_dir -name "hq-server.sh"` su - $hq_os_user_name -c "$HQ_SERVER_SCRIPT start" 2>&1 | tee -a $log_file
echo "Finished HQ Server configuration action." >> $log_file

ns9:component-version-script.description: JBoss configure yum repo, also update all packages, install jBoss server
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
#Setup JBoss
cd /tmp mv $cheetah_tgz_url . filename=`basename $cheetah_tgz_url` CHEETAH_TGZ_PATH=/tmp/$filename mv $zip_url . filename=`basename $zip_url` JBOSS_ZIP_PATH=/tmp/$filename echo "PATH: $PATH" > properties.txt echo "cheetah_install_script: $cheetah_install_script " >> properties.txt echo "jboss_install_script: $jboss_install_script" >> properties.txt echo "CHEETAH_TGZ_PATH: $CHEETAH_TGZ_PATH" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_ZIP_PATH: $JBOSS_ZIP_PATH" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION: $JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME: $JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_JMX_USER: $JBOSS_JMX_USER" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_JMX_PWD: $JBOSS_JMX_PWD" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE: $JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE: $JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_PEER_NAME: $JBOSS_PEER_NAME" >> properties.txt . $cheetah_install_script &>1 2>&1 | tee /tmp/cheetah_output . $jboss_install_script

ns9:component-version-script.description: UPDATE-lifecycle script for JBoss app server
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # This is the UPDATE lifecycle script for JBoss service to update JBOSS_JMX_USER and JBOSS_JMX_PWD. # If other properties are changed, the script will need to be adjusted accordingly.
echo "JBoss server UPDATE."
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
[ -z "$JBOSS_JMX_USER" ] && echo "Need to set JBOSS_JMX_USER" && exit 1 [ -z "$JBOSS_JMX_PWD" ] && echo "Need to set JBOSS_JMX_PWD" && exit 1
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(JBOSS_JMX_USER|JBOSS_JMX_PWD)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
echo "Stop JBoss service" service jboss stop sleep 60
HOME_DIR=/home/jboss export JBOSS_USER=jboss export JBOSS_HOME=$HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as BOOTRC=/etc/init.d/jboss
echo "Re-generate JBoss booting script..." cheetah fill -p --env $JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE > $BOOTRC
echo "Update jmx console users..." JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR=$JBOSS_HOME/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME
cd $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR/conf/props cheetah fill -p --env $JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE > jmx-console-users.properties
echo "Starting JBoss service again..." service jboss start
echo "Finished JBoss Server UPDATE"

ns9:component-version-script.description: JBoss: install JBoss server binaries on Windows using Powershell

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns9:component-version-script.description: JBoss: configure JBoss server on Windows using Powershell
ns9:component-version-script.script:
# Validate java installation directory path. if(!(Test-Path -path $JAVA_INSTALL_DIR)) { write-output "ERROR. $JAVA_INSTALL_DIR does not exist." exit 1 }
# Recursively try and locate the java.exe $javaFilePath = Get-ChildItem -Path $JAVA_INSTALL_DIR -Filter "java.exe" -Recurse if(!$javaFilePath) { write-output "ERROR. Java executable (java.exe) not found under $JAVA_INSTALL_DIR." exit 1 }
# Configure JMX credential info, firewall settings and Windows service $JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_INSTALL_DIR"
#$JBOSS_HOME="$JBOSS_HOME_DIR\$env:JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION\jboss-as" $JBOSS_HOME="$JBOSS_HOME_DIR\$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION" $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR="$JBOSS_HOME\server\$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME"
set-location $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR\conf\props
# Remove default JMX credential $source = Get-Content jmx-console-users.properties | Out-String $pattern = "admin=.*" $newfile = [Regex]::Replace( $source, $pattern, "" ) Set-Content jmx-console-users.properties $newfile; #Add JMX credential info add-content jmx-console-users.properties " `r`n$JBOSS_JMX_USER=$JBOSS_JMX_PWD"
# Add JVM route to server.xml copy $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR/deploy/jbossweb.sar/server.xml $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR/deploy/jbossweb.sar/server.xml.bak (Get-Content $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR/deploy/jbossweb.sar/server.xml) -replace 'Engine name[^`>]*', "$& jvmRoute=`"$JVM_ROUTE`"" | Set-Content $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR/deploy/jbossweb.sar/server.xml
# And, we need to allow for Windows firewall settings netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Java_In_Rule" dir=in program="$JAVA_HOME\bin\java.exe" action=allow netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Java_Out_Rule" dir=out program="$JAVA_HOME\bin\java.exe" action=allow
$env:JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_HOME $env:JBOSS_HOME=$JBOSS_HOME
$env:Path="$JBOSS_HOME\bin;" + $env:Path
(get-content $JBOSS_HOME\bin\service.bat) | %{$_ -replace "%JBOSS_HOME%", "$JBOSS_HOME"} | set-content $JBOSS_HOME\bin\service.bat (get-content $JBOSS_HOME\bin\service.bat) | %{$_ -replace "%JAVA_HOME%", "$JAVA_HOME"} | set-content $JBOSS_HOME\bin\service.bat (get-content $JBOSS_HOME\bin\service.bat) | %{$_ -replace "%JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME%", "$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME"} | set-content $JBOSS_HOME\bin\service.bat . $JBOSS_HOME\bin\service.bat install
# The Service Name is obtained from inside the service.bat script $serviceName="JBAS50SVC" set-service $serviceName -startuptype automatic

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns9:component-version-script.description: Start JBoss Server as a Windows Service
ns9:component-version-script.script:
# The Service Name is obtained from inside the service.bat script $serviceName="JBAS50SVC" start-service $serviceName
# Check and report status $serviceAfter=Get-Service $serviceName $serviceAfterStatus=$serviceAfter.status write-output "$serviceName is now $serviceAfterStatus"

service-versions.name: JBoss on Windows_vij
service-versions.description: JBoss 5.1 on Windows JBoss Application Server is the open source implementation of the Java EE suite of services. It comprises a set of offerings for enterprise customers who are looking for preconfigured profiles of JBoss Enterprise Middleware components that have been tested and certified together to provide an integrated experience. It's easy-to-use server architecture and high flexibility makes JBoss the ideal choice for users just starting out with J2EE, as well as senior architects looking for a customizable middleware platform.

\windows\system32
et stop "SQL Server (%INSTANCENAME%)" \windows\system32

etsh advfirewall firewall set rule name="Network Discovery (NB-Name-In)" new enable=yes \Windows\system32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe -command set-itemproperty -path "'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL10_50.%INSTANCENAME%\MSSQLServer\SuperSocketNetLib\Tcp'" -name enabled -value 1 \Windows\system32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe -command set-service -name SQLBrowser -StartupType automatic

#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Fix the linux-firmware package export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y linux-firmware < /dev/console > /dev/console # Install MySQL package apt-get install -y mysql-server else yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install -x MySQL-server-community mysql-server fi

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# update mysql configuration to handle big packets sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ max_allowed_packet=1024M/g" $my_cnf_file # update listening port sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Make sure that MySQL is started service mysql restart else # set up auto-start on booting chkconfig mysqld on # restart mysqld service service mysqld start fi
# this will assign a password for mysql admin user 'root' mysqladmin -u $db_root_username password $db_root_password

ns9:component-version-script.description: UPDATE-lifecycle script for changing the MySQL properties
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # This is the UPDATE lifecycle script for MySql service to update db_port. # If other properties are changed, the script will need to be adjusted accordingly.
echo "MyAQL server UPDATE to update db_port"
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# stop the mysql service before updating the port number if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Make sure that MySQL is started service mysql stop else service mysqld stop fi
# update listening port sed -ie "s/port=[0-9]*/port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
# start the mysql service after updating the port number if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Make sure that MySQL is started service mysql start else service mysqld start fi
echo "Finished MySQL Server UPDATE"

#!/bin/sh # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
#Set the configuration to use the correct ntp server cat > /etc/ntp.conf << EOF restrict default kod nomodify notrap nopeer noquery restrict -6 default kod nomodify notrap nopeer noquery
restrict 127.0.0.1 restrict -6 ::1
server 127.127.1.0 fudge 127.127.1.0 stratum 10
driftfile /var/lib/ntp/drift
keys /etc/ntp/keys
server $ntp_server EOF
#Add cron job to keep updating echo '30 * * * * root /usr/sbin/ntpd -q -u ntp:ntp' > /etc/cron.daily/ntpd
/usr/sbin/ntpd -q -u ntp:ntp

ns9:component-version-script.description: Script to install Weblogic Application Service 12c
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Import global conf . $global_conf
# Common import . $common_utils
export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:$PATH
# Need JDK not JRE try yum -y install java-1.6.0-openjdk-devel try update-alternatives --auto java
# What is this for?? if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then if [ -x /usr/sbin/setenforce ]; then /usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive else echo 'SELinux is enabled.This may cause installation to fail.' fi fi
#########SCRIPT INTERNAL PARAMETERS######################## . $weblogic_common
#### ADDING THE DEDICATED GROUP AND WEBLOGIC USER echo "Adding WebLogic User" groupadd $wl_group try useradd -g $wl_group -d $bea_home $wl_admin_user echo -e "$wl_admin_password\n$wl_admin_password" | passwd $wl_admin_user if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "Failed to set password for $wl_admin_user" exit -1 fi echo "Adding WebLogic User DONE"
#Basic Directory Structure try mkdir -p $wl_home try mkdir $wl_tmp_files_dir
echo "Setting up keys" cat > $wl_tmp_files_dir/setup_keys.cmd << EOF mkdir ~/.ssh cp $weblogic_pkey ~/.ssh/id_rsa cat $weblogic_pubkey > ~/.ssh/authorized_keys cat > ~/.ssh/config << EOF2 Host * UserKnownHostsFile /dev/null StrictHostKeyChecking no EOF2 chmod -R 400 ~/.ssh/* chmod 500 ~/.ssh EOF try su - $wl_admin_user -p -c \". $wl_tmp_files_dir/setup_keys.cmd\" echo "Setting up keys done"
export wl_config="$bea_home/weblogic_silent.install.xml" echo "Creating $wl_config" try cat > $wl_config << EOF <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <bea-installer> <input-fields> <data-value name="BEAHOME" value="$bea_home" /> <data-value name="WLS_INSTALL_DIR" value="$wl_home" /> <data-value name="WLW_INSTALL_DIR" value="$wl_home" /> <data-value name="COMPONENT_PATHS" value="WebLogic Server|Oracle Coherence" /> <data-value name="INSTALL_NODE_MANAGER_SERVICE" value="no" /> <data-value name="NODEMGR_PORT" value="5559" /> </input-fields> </bea-installer> EOF echo "weblogic_silent.install.xml created"
echo "Installing WebLogic Server" try java -jar $weblogic_installer -mode=silent -silent_xml=$wl_config -log=install.log
echo "Removing sample domains to avoid them being picked up" echo "execing rm -fr $wl_home/samples/domains/wl_server" rm -fr $wl_home/samples/domains/wl_server echo "execing rm -fr $wl_home/samples/domains/medrec-spring" rm -fr $wl_home/samples/domains/medrec-spring echo "execing rm -fr $wl_home/samples/domains/medrec" rm -fr $wl_home/samples/domains/medrec
chown -R $wl_admin_user:$wl_group $bea_home chmod 700 $wl_home
echo "Installed Successfully"

ns9:component-version-script.description: Script to start Weblogic Application Service 12c
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Import global conf . $global_conf
PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/opt/vmware/bin:/opt/vmware/bin export JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/default export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH
function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi } function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
BEA_HOME="$webLogic_home" WLS_INSTALL_DIR="$BEA_HOME/WebLogic" WLSINSTALLERLOCATION="$WLS_INSTALL_DIR/INSTALLER" WLSSTARTSCRIPT="$WLSINSTALLERLOCATION/wls_start.sh" WLS_START_LOCATION="$WLS_INSTALL_DIR/samples/domains/wl_server" WLS_LOG_LOCATION="$WLS_START_LOCATION/servers/examplesServer/logs/wl_server.log" SERVER_IP="$weblogic_server_ip" GROUP_NAME="$group_name" USER_NAME="$user_name"
# CREATING WEBLOGIC START SCRIPT FILE cat << EOF > $WLSSTARTSCRIPT #!/bin/bash cd $WLS_START_LOCATION/bin ./startWebLogic.sh & sleep 70 EOF check_error "Error while creating Configuration file"
chmod -R 775 $WLSSTARTSCRIPT echo "Starting WebLogic Server..." su - $USER_NAME -c $WLSSTARTSCRIPT
# Try 60 times to start post-install scripts, which means the script will wait for about 10mins at most # until the installation finishes (each loop will wait for 10 seconds for the installation to finish.) SLEEP_PERIOD=10 LOOP_ITERATION=60 for (( i = 0 ; i < $LOOP_ITERATION ; i++ )) do grep -q "The server started in RUNNING mode" $WLS_LOG_LOCATION
if [ "$?" == "0" ]; then touch weblogicServer_check.html sleep 10 wget http://$SERVER_IP:7001/console/login/LoginForm.jsp -q -O weblogicServer_check.html grep -q "Deploying Application" weblogicServer_check.html if [ "$?" = "0" ] ; then echo "WebLogic Server started Successfully" else echo "WebLogic Server is not started" fi break else sleep $SLEEP_PERIOD fi done
#REMOVING THE UNNECESSARY FILES rm -rf $WLSINSTALLERLOCATION

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/opt/vmware/bin:/opt/vmware/bin:$PATH export HOME=/root
# TESTED ON CENTOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then if [ -x /usr/sbin/setenforce ]; then /usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive else echo 'SELINUX IS ENABLED. THIS MAY CAUSE INSTALLATION TO FAIL.' fi fi
#########MAKE SWAPFILE FOR INSTALLER############# #ORACLE INSTALLER WILL TEST FOR A SWAP SIZE OF 150M, THIS GARUNTEES WE HAVE IT dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/swapfile bs=1024 count=150000 mkswap /tmp/swapfile swapon /tmp/swapfile
#########PARAMTERS FROM APP DIRECTOR######### INSTALL_EDITION="$install_edition" SELECTED_LANGUAGES="$selected_languages" EMAIL_ADDRESS="$email_address" ORACLE_BASE="$oracle_base" ORACLE_HOSTNAME="$oracle_hostname" LISTENER_PROTOCOL="$listener_protocol" LISTENER_PORT="$listener_port" GDBNAME="$gdbname" SID="$sid" SYSTEMPASSWORD="$systempassword" SYSPASSWORD="$syspassword" INVENTORY_LOCATION="$inventory_location" ZYPPER_REPOSITORY="$zypper_repository" NFS_PATH="$nfs_path"
#########SCRIPT INTERNAL PARAMETERS######### ORACLE_HOME="$ORACLE_BASE/product/11.2.0/db_1"
MOUNTPOINTLOCATION=/tmp/mount ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION="$ORACLE_BASE/orclinstaller" SYSCTLCONF="/etc/sysctl.conf" ORACLEINSTALLSCRIPT="$ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/orclscript_runinstaller.sh" ORACLENETCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT="$ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/orclscript_netca_configuration.sh" ORACLEDBCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT="$ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/orclscript_dbca_configuration.sh"
#RESPONSE FILE LOCATION DBFILE="$ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/database/response/db_install.rsp" NETCAFILE="$ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/database/response/netca.rsp" DBCAFILE="$ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/database/response/dbca.rsp"
#RESPONSE FILE BACKUP LOCATION DBFILE_BACKUP="$ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/database/response/db_install-original.rsp" NETCAFILE_BACKUP="$ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/database/response/netca-original.rsp" DBCAFILE_BACKUP="$ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/database/response/dbca-original.rsp" PROGNAME=`basename $0`
#ARRAY INSTALL_EDITION_ARRAY=(EE SE SEONE PE) LISTENER_PROTOCOL_ARRAY=(TCP TCPS NMP IPC VI) LANG_ARRAY=(en fr ar bn pt_BR bg fr_CA ca hr cs da nl ar_EG en_GB et fi de el iw hu is in it ja ko es lv lt ms es_MX no pl pt ro ru zh_CN sk sl es_ES sv th zh_TW tr uk vi)
###########PARAMTER VALIDATION FUNCTIONS################## ## CHECK STRING CONTENTS function string_contains() { stringToCheck=$1 valueToLookFor=$2 if [[ "$stringToCheck" == *"$valueToLookFor"* ]] then return 1; else return 0; fi }
## FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
## FUNCTION TO VALIDATE INTEGER function valid_int() { local data=$1 if [[ $data =~ ^[0-9]{1,9}$ ]]; then return 0; else return 1 fi }
function check_install_edition() { len=${#INSTALL_EDITION_ARRAY[*]} local temp=$1; for (( i=0; $i < $len; i++ )) do if [ "${INSTALL_EDITION_ARRAY[$i]}" = "$temp" ]; then return; fi done error_exit "INVALID INSTALL EDITION" }
function check_listener_protocol() { len=${#LISTENER_PROTOCOL_ARRAY[*]} local temp=$1; for (( i=0; $i < $len; i++ )) do if [ "${LISTENER_PROTOCOL_ARRAY[$i]}" = "$temp" ]; then return; fi done error_exit "INVALID LISTENER PROTOCOL" }
function check_lang() { len=${#LANG_ARRAY[*]} local temp=`echo $1 | tr ',' ' '`; local result=-1; for j in $temp ; do for (( i=0; $i < $len; i++ )) do if [ "${LANG_ARRAY[$i]}" = "$j" ]; then result=0; break; fi done if [ $result = 0 ] ; then result=-1; else error_exit "INVALID LANGUAGE" fi done return 0; }
function check_email() { local email=$1; case $email in *@?*.?*) ;; *) error_exit "Invalid EMAIL ID"; false ;; esac }
function echo_d() { CURDATE=`date +%H:%M:%S` echo -e $CURDATE "$*" }
####################SCRIPT EXECUTION ################## echo "PARAMTER VALIDATION"
if [ "x${ORACLE_HOSTNAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_HOSTNAME not set." fi
if [ "x${INVENTORY_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "INVENTORY_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${SELECTED_LANGUAGES}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "SELECTED_LANGUAGES not set." else check_lang $SELECTED_LANGUAGES fi # IF 'EN' IS NOT IN THE SELECTED LANGUAGE LIST, ADD IT THERE. if [ "x`echo $SELECTED_LANGUAGES | grep -w "en"`" = "x" ]; then SELECTED_LANGUAGES+=",en" fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_HOME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_HOME not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_BASE}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_BASE not set." fi
if [ "x${INSTALL_EDITION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "INSTALL_EDITION not set." else check_install_edition $INSTALL_EDITION; fi
if [ "x${EMAIL_ADDRESS}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "EMAIL_ADDRESS not set." else check_email $EMAIL_ADDRESS; fi
if [ "x${LISTENER_PROTOCOL}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "LISTENER_PROTOCOL not set." else check_listener_protocol $LISTENER_PROTOCOL fi
if [ "x${LISTENER_PORT}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "LISTENER_PORT not set." else if ! valid_int $LISTENER_PORT; then error_exit "Invalid parameter LISTENER_PORT" fi fi
if [ "x${GDBNAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GDBNAME not set." fi
if [ "x${SID}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "SID not set." fi
if [ "x${SYSTEMPASSWORD}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "SYSTEMPASSWORD not set." fi
if [ "x${SYSPASSWORD}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "SYSPASSWORD not set." fi
if [ "x${NFS_PATH}" = "x" ]; then check_error "NFS_PATH not set." fi echo "PARAMTER VALIDATION -- DONE"
#Checking the OS version
KERNEL=`uname -r` MACH=`uname -m`
SLEEP_PERIOD=30 LOOP_ITERATION=5 if [ -f /etc/redhat-release ]; then basearch=`uname -p` DistroBasedOn='RedHat' DIST=`cat /etc/redhat-release |sed s/\ release.*//` if [ "$DIST" = "CentOS" ] ; then for (( i = 0 ; i < $LOOP_ITERATION ; i++ )) do yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install binutils make compat-db gcc gcc-c++ libstdc++ lbXtst pdksh sysstat compat-libstdc++-33 glibc elfutils-libelf elfutils-libelf-devel elfutils-libelf-devel-static numactl-devel unixODBC unixODBC-devel libaio libaio-devel nfs-utils unzip if [ $? -eq 0 ] then echo "PACKAGES INSTALLED SUCCESSFULLY" /sbin/service portmap start break fi if [ $i -eq 5 ]; then echo "UNABLE TO INSTALL REQUIRED PACKAGES..." exit 1 fi sleep 10 done else wget http://fr2.rpmfind.net/linux/centos/6.1/os/x86_64/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6 rpm --import RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6 for (( i = 0 ; i < $LOOP_ITERATION ; i++ )) do yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install binutils compat-libstdc++-33 compat-libstdc++ elfutils-libelf elfutils-libelf-devel gcc gcc-c++ glibc glibc glibc-common glibc-devel glibc-devel libaio libaio-devel libgcc libgcc libstdc++ lbXtst libstdc++ libstdc++-devel make numactl-devel sysstat nfs-utils pdksh unixODBC unixODBC-devel unzip glibc.i686 if [ $? -eq 0 ] then echo "PACKAGES INSTALLED SUCCESSFULLY" /sbin/service portmap start break fi if [ $i -eq 4 ]; then echo "UNABLE TO INSTALL REQUIRED PACKAGES..." exit 1 fi sleep 10 done fi elif [ -f /etc/SuSE-release ] ; then DistroBasedOn='SuSe' echo $DistroBasedOn zypper rr repo-oss zypper ar -f $ZYPPER_REPOSITORY repo-oss for (( i = 0 ; i < $LOOP_ITERATION ; i++ )) do zypper --non-interactive --no-gpg-checks ref zypper --non-interactive --no-gpg-checks install libgcc45 libstdc++45 glibc gcc gcc-c++ libstdc++-devel ksh pdksh sysstat libmudflap elfutils make libelf-devel unixODBC unixODBC-devel nfs-kernel-server unzip if [ $? -eq 0 ] then echo "PACKAGES INSTALLED SUCCESSFULLY" break fi if [ $i -eq 5 ]; then echo "UNABLE TO INSTALL REQUIRED PACKAGES..." exit 1 fi sleep 10 done elif [ -f /etc/debian_version ] ; then DistroBasedOn='Debian' echo $DistroBasedOn export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive for (( i = 0 ; i < $LOOP_ITERATION ; i++ )) do apt-get -f -y install apt-get update apt-get -y upgrade --fix-missing apt-get -f -y install apt-get -y install gcc autofs alien libaio1 unixodbc pdksh sysstat nfs-kernel-server libgcc1-dbg glibc-2* elfutils unzip --fix-missing if [ $? -eq 0 ] then echo "PACKAGES INSTALLED SUCCESSFULLY" break fi if [ $i -eq 5 ]; then echo "UNABLE TO INSTALL REQUIRED PACKAGES..." exit 1 fi sleep 10 done fi
#BASIC DIRECTORY STRUCTURE mkdir -p $MOUNTPOINTLOCATION mkdir -p $ORACLE_BASE mkdir -p $ORACLE_HOME mkdir -p $INVENTORY_LOCATION mkdir -p $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION check_error "ERRORS DURING CREATING BASIC DIRECOTRY STRUCTURE.";
#Mount NFS_PATH mount $NFS_PATH $MOUNTPOINTLOCATION check_error "Errors during mounting Oracle installer.";
if [ $DistroBasedOn = "RedHat" ] || [ $DistroBasedOn = "SuSe" ]; then echo "$DistroBasedOn" basesearch=`uname -p` echo "$basesearch" echo "INSIDE RHEL OR SUSE.............." if [ $basesearch == "x86_64" ] ; then #COPY ORACLE 11G INSTALLER(64-BIT) echo "STARTED COPYING...RHEL OR SUSE 64 " cd $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION cp $MOUNTPOINTLOCATION/linux.x64_11gR2_database_1of2.zip $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux.x64_11gR2_database_1of2.zip check_error "Errors during copying zip 1of2 of Oracle installer."; cp $MOUNTPOINTLOCATION/linux.x64_11gR2_database_2of2.zip $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux.x64_11gR2_database_2of2.zip check_error "Errors during copying zip 2of2 of Oracle installer."; echo "MOUNTING ORACLE INSTALLER -- DONE" #UNZIP echo "EXTRACTING ORACLE INSTALLER" unzip -q $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux.x64_11gR2_database_1of2.zip -d $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION unzip -q $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux.x64_11gR2_database_2of2.zip -d $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION check_error "ERRORS DURING EXTRACTING ORACLE INSTALLER."; echo "EXTRACTING ORACLE INSTALLER -- DONE" else # Copy Oracle 11g Installer(32-bit) echo "STARTED COPYING....RHEL OR SUSE 32 " cd $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION cp $MOUNTPOINTLOCATION/linux_11gR2_database_1of2.zip $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux_11gR2_database_1of2.zip check_error "Errors during copying zip 1of2 of Oracle installer."; cp $MOUNTPOINTLOCATION/linux_11gR2_database_2of2.zip $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux_11gR2_database_2of2.zip check_error "Errors during copying zip 2of2 of Oracle installer."; echo "MOUNTING ORACLE INSTALLER -- DONE" #UNZIP echo "EXTRACTING ORACLE INSTALLER" unzip -q $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux_11gR2_database_1of2.zip -d $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION unzip -q $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux_11gR2_database_2of2.zip -d $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION check_error "ERRORS DURING EXTRACTING ORACLE INSTALLER."; echo "EXTRACTING ORACLE INSTALLER -- DONE" fi else echo "INSIDE UBUNTU.............." BaseSearch=`uname -m` echo "$BaseSearch" if [ $BaseSearch == "x86_64" ] ; then cd $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION cp $MOUNTPOINTLOCATION/linux.x64_11gR2_database_1of2.zip $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux.x64_11gR2_database_1of2.zip check_error "Errors during copying zip 1of2 of Oracle installer."; cp $MOUNTPOINTLOCATION/linux.x64_11gR2_database_2of2.zip $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux.x64_11gR2_database_2of2.zip check_error "Errors during copying zip 2of2 of Oracle installer."; echo "MOUNTING ORACLE INSTALLER -- DONE" #Unzip echo "EXTRACTING ORACLE INSTALLER" unzip -q $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux.x64_11gR2_database_1of2.zip -d $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION unzip -q $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux.x64_11gR2_database_2of2.zip -d $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION check_error "ERRORS DURING EXTRACTING ORACLE INSTALLER."; echo "EXTRACTING ORACLE INSTALLER -- DONE" else echo "STARTED COPYING....UBUNTU 32 " cd $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION cp $MOUNTPOINTLOCATION/linux_11gR2_database_1of2.zip $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux_11gR2_database_1of2.zip check_error "Errors during copying zip 1of2 of Oracle installer."; cp $MOUNTPOINTLOCATION/linux_11gR2_database_2of2.zip $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux_11gR2_database_2of2.zip check_error "Errors during copying zip 2of2 of Oracle installer."; check_error "ERRORS DURING COPYING ORACLE INSTALLER."; echo "MOUNTING ORACLE INSTALLER -- DONE" #UNZIP echo $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION echo "EXTRACTING ORACLE INSTALLER" unzip -q $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux_11gR2_database_1of2.zip -d $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION unzip -q $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/linux_11gR2_database_2of2.zip -d $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION check_error "ERRORS DURING EXTRACTING ORACLE INSTALLER."; echo "EXTRACTING ORACLE INSTALLER -- DONE" fi fi
echo "MODIFYING THE RESPONSE FILES" #jacp --backup --force -- $DBFILE $DBFILE_BACKUP cp --backup --force -- $NETCAFILE $NETCAFILE_BACKUP cp --backup --force -- $DBCAFILE $DBCAFILE_BACKUP
#CHANING THE PARAMETER IN db.rsp sed -i "s~ORACLE_HOSTNAME=*~ORACLE_HOSTNAME=$ORACLE_HOSTNAME~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~INVENTORY_LOCATION=*~INVENTORY_LOCATION=$INVENTORY_LOCATION~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~SELECTED_LANGUAGES=*~SELECTED_LANGUAGES=$SELECTED_LANGUAGES~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~ORACLE_HOME=*~ORACLE_HOME=$ORACLE_HOME~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~ORACLE_BASE=*~ORACLE_BASE=$ORACLE_BASE~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.InstallEdition=*~oracle.install.db.InstallEdition=$INSTALL_EDITION~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.dbcontrol.emailAddress=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.dbcontrol.emailAddress=$EMAIL_ADDRESS~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.dbcontrol.enableEmailNotification=.*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.dbcontrol.enableEmailNotification=true~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.option=*~oracle.install.option=INSTALL_DB_SWONLY~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~UNIX_GROUP_NAME=*~UNIX_GROUP_NAME=oinstall~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.DBA_GROUP=*~oracle.install.db.DBA_GROUP=dba~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.OPER_GROUP=*~oracle.install.db.OPER_GROUP=oinstall~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.type=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.type=GENERAL_PURPOSE~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~SECURITY_UPDATES_VIA_MYORACLESUPPORT=*~SECURITY_UPDATES_VIA_MYORACLESUPPORT=false~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~DECLINE_SECURITY_UPDATES=*~DECLINE_SECURITY_UPDATES=true~g" $DBFILE
#CHANING THE PARAMETER IN netca.rsp LISTENERPROTOCOL="{\"$LISTENER_PROTOCOL;$LISTENER_PORT\"}" sed -i "s~LISTENER_PROTOCOLS=*~#LISTENER_PROTOCOLS=~g" $NETCAFILE echo "LISTENER_PROTOCOLS = $LISTENERPROTOCOL" >> $NETCAFILE
#CHANING THE PARAMETER IN dbca.rsp sed -i "s~GDBNAME=*~#GDBNAME~g" $DBCAFILE sed -i "s~SID=*~#SID~g" $DBCAFILE sed -i "150iGDBNAME = $GDBNAME" $DBCAFILE sed -i "150iSID = $SID" $DBCAFILE sed -i "150iSYSTEMPASSWORD = $SYSTEMPASSWORD" $DBCAFILE sed -i "150iSYSPASSWORD = $SYSPASSWORD" $DBCAFILE echo "Modifying the response files -- DONE"
#SETUP USERS ANDS GROUPS echo "Adding Oracle User" /usr/sbin/groupadd oinstall /usr/sbin/groupadd dba /usr/sbin/useradd -m -g oinstall -G dba oracle check_error "Errors during setting up user accounts."; echo "ADDING ORACLE USER -- DONE"
echo "SETTING KERNEL PARAMETERS" #SET KERNEL PARAMETERS echo "kernel.shmmni=4096" >> $SYSCTLCONF echo "kernel.sem=250 32000 100 128" >> $SYSCTLCONF echo "fs.file-max=6815744" >> $SYSCTLCONF echo "net.ipv4.ip_local_port_range=9000 65500" >> $SYSCTLCONF echo "net.core.rmem_default=262144" >> $SYSCTLCONF echo "net.core.wmem_default=262144" >> $SYSCTLCONF echo "net.core.rmem_max=4194304" >> $SYSCTLCONF echo "net.core.wmem_max=1048576" >> $SYSCTLCONF echo "fs.aio-max-nr=1048576" >> $SYSCTLCONF
# UPLOAD CHANGED KERNEL PARAMETERS /sbin/sysctl -p echo "SETTING KERNEL PARAMETERS -- DONE"
#SETTING PERMISSION chown -R oracle:oinstall $ORACLE_BASE chown -R oracle:oinstall $ORACLE_HOME chown -R oracle:oinstall $INVENTORY_LOCATION chmod -R 775 $ORACLE_BASE chmod -R 775 $ORACLE_HOME chmod -R 775 $INVENTORY_LOCATION check_error "ERRORS DURING SETTING PERMISSION ON BASIC DIRECOTRY STRUCTURE.";
#MODIFYING THE SHELL LIMIT echo "MODIFYING THE SHELL LIMIT" echo "oracle soft nproc 2047" >> /etc/security/limits.conf echo "oracle hard nproc 16384" >> /etc/security/limits.conf echo "oracle soft nofile 1024" >> /etc/security/limits.conf echo "oracle hard nofile 65536" >> /etc/security/limits.conf echo "Modifying the shell limit -- DONE"
#MODIFYING PAM.D LOGIN echo "session required pam_limits.so" >> /etc/pam.d/login
#MODIFY THE BASH PROFILE ORACLE USER echo "ORACLE_HOSTNAME=$ORACLE_HOSTNAME" >> /home/oracle/.bash_profile echo "ORACLE_UNQNAME=$SID" >> /home/oracle/.bash_profile echo "ORACLE_BASE=$ORACLE_BASE" >> /home/oracle/.bash_profile echo "ORACLE_HOME=$ORACLE_HOME" >> /home/oracle/.bash_profile echo "ORACLE_SID=$SID" >> /home/oracle/.bash_profile echo "PATH=/usr/sbin:$ORACLE_HOME/bin:$PATH" >> /home/oracle/.bash_profile echo "export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$ORACLE_HOME/lib:/lib:/usr/lib:/usr/lib64:$ORACLE_HOME/lib32" >> /home/oracle/.bash_profile echo "export CLASSPATH=$ORACLE_HOME/jlib:$ORACLE_HOME/rdbms/jlib" >> /home/oracle/.bash_profile
# RUN INSTALLER touch $ORACLEINSTALLSCRIPT chmod 777 $ORACLEINSTALLSCRIPT echo "#!/bin/bash" >> $ORACLEINSTALLSCRIPT echo "cd $ORCALEINSTALLERLOCATION/database" >> $ORACLEINSTALLSCRIPT echo "./runInstaller -silent -force -ignorePrereq -responseFile $DBFILE" >> $ORACLEINSTALLSCRIPT echo "exit \"$?\"" >> $ORACLEINSTALLSCRIPT
touch $ORACLENETCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT chmod 777 $ORACLENETCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT echo "#!/bin/bash" >> $ORACLENETCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT echo "cd $ORACLE_HOME/bin/" >> $ORACLENETCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT echo "./netca -silent -responseFile $NETCAFILE" >> $ORACLENETCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT echo "exit \"$?\"" >> $ORACLENETCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT
touch $ORACLEDBCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT chmod 777 $ORACLEDBCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT echo "#!/bin/bash" >> $ORACLEDBCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT echo "cd $ORACLE_HOME/bin/" >> $ORACLEDBCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT echo "./dbca -silent -responseFile $DBCAFILE" >> $ORACLEDBCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT echo "exit \"$?\"" >> $ORACLEDBCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT
#SWITCH ORACLE USER echo "STARTING ORACLE INSTALLER" #xhost + su - oracle -c $ORACLEINSTALLSCRIPT check_error "UNSUCCESSFULL DATABASE INSTALLATION"; echo "" echo_d "WAIT 3 MINUTES ..." sleep 180 # TRY 120 TIMES TO START POST-INSTALL SCRIPTS, WHICH MEANS THE SCRIPT WILL WAIT FOR ABOUT 1HR AT MOST #UNTIL THE INSTALLATION FINISHES (EACH LOOP WILL WAIT FOR 30 SECONDS FOR THE INSTALLATION TO FINISH.) SLEEP_PERIOD=30 LOOP_ITERATION=120 for (( i = 0 ; i < $LOOP_ITERATION ; i++ )) do grep -q "Shutdown Oracle Database 11g Release 2 Installer" $INVENTORY_LOCATION/logs/installActions*.log if [ $? -eq 0 ] then grep -q "Exit Status is 0" $INVENTORY_LOCATION/logs/installActions*.log if [ $? -eq 0 ] then echo "ORACLE SUCCESSFULLY INSTALLED" $ORACLE_HOME/root.sh echo "CONFIGURING ORACLE" echo "start netca configuration" TERM=OFF setterm: $TERM /bin/su - oracle -c "export DISPLAY=:0; $ORACLENETCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT" check_error "UNSUCCESSFULL NETCA CONFIGURATION"; echo "start netca configuration" /bin/su - oracle -c $ORACLEDBCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT check_error "UNSUCCESSFULL DBCA CONFIGURATION"; echo "CONFIGURING ORACLE -- DONE" break else echo "ORACLE NOT SUCCESSFULLY INSTALLED" break fi else sleep 30 fi done
cd $ORACLE_HOME/bin
#--- Check for the listener and that we have our service registered SLEEP_PERIOD=30 LOOP_ITERATION=10 CMDOUT='' STARTED=0
#Clean up umount $MOUNTPOINTLOCATION check_error "Errors during umounting $MOUNTPOINTLOCATION."; rm $ORACLEINSTALLSCRIPT rm $ORACLENETCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT rm $ORACLEDBCACONFIGURATIONSCRIPT

ns9:component-version-script.description: Configuring and Starting SQL Server service
ns9:component-version-script.script:
@echo off
set TCP_OPTS= if "%ENABLE_TCP%" neq "yes" goto NoTcp echo Enabling TCP set TCP_OPTS=/tcpenabled=1
:NoTcp
set SECURITY_OPTS= if "%ENABLE_SQL_AUTH%" neq "yes" goto NoSqlAuth if "%SAPWD%" neq "" goto SetSecurityOpts
echo Error: SAPWD must be set when ENABLE_SQL_SECURITY is set exit /b 1
:SetSecurityOpts set SECURITY_OPTS=/SECURITYMODE=sql /SAPWD="%SAPWD%"
:NoSqlAuth
"%INSTALLATION_FILES_DIR%\setup.exe" /IACCEPTSQLSERVERLICENSETERMS /action=completeimage /q /instanceid="%INSTANCEID%" /instancename="%INSTANCENAME%" /BROWSERSVCSTARTUPTYPE=automatic %TCP_OPTS% %SECURITY_OPTS% /SQLSVCACCOUNT="%SQLSVCACCOUNT%" /SQLSYSADMINACCOUNTS="%SQLSYSADMINACCOUNTS%" /indicateprogress
if errorlevel 1 goto ErrorDetected if "%ENABLE_TCP%" neq "yes" goto NoFirewall
echo --Begin firewall configuration-- echo Stopping SQL Browser service... net stop SQLBrowser if errorlevel 1 goto ErrorDetected echo Stopping SQL Server instance... net stop "SQL Server (%INSTANCENAME%)" if errorlevel 1 goto ErrorDetected echo Creating firewall rules... netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="SQL Server" dir=in program="c:\program files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL10_50.%INSTANCEID%\MSSQL\Binn\sqlservr.exe" action=allow if errorlevel 1 goto ErrorDetected netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="SQL Server Browser" dir=in program="C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SQL Server\90\Shared\sqlbrowser.exe" action=allow if errorlevel 1 goto ErrorDetected echo Starting SQL Server instance... net start "SQL Server (%INSTANCENAME%)" if errorlevel 1 goto ErrorDetected echo Starting SQL Browser service... net start SQLBrowser if errorlevel 1 goto ErrorDetected echo --End firewall configuration--
:NoFirewall
echo SQL Server configuration succeeded. exit /b 0
:ErrorDetected echo SQL Server configuration failed.

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
if [ ! -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then echo "The /etc/my.cnf file cannot be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# update mysql configuration to handle big packets sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ max_allowed_packet=1024M/g" /etc/my.cnf # update listening port sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ port=$db_port/g" /etc/my.cnf
# set up auto-start on booting chkconfig mysqld on # restart mysqld service service mysqld start # this will assign a password for mysql admin user 'root' mysqladmin -u $db_root_username password $db_root_password

ns9:component-version-script.description: Script to install Ruby on Rails
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash set -e
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin export HOME=/root
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------- # Properties from AppDirector Service #--------------------------------------------------------------------------- RAILS_VERSION=$rails_version RUBY_VERSION=$ruby_version
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------- # Util Methods #--------------------------------------------------------------------------- # Test a system call and exit if fails function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
yum -y --nogpgcheck install git gcc-c++ patch readline readline-devel zlib zlib-devel libyaml-devel libffi-devel openssl-devel make bzip2 autoconf automake libtool bison iconv-devel libjpeg-devel giflib-devel freetype-devel curl curl curl-devel httpd httpd-devel apr-devel apr-util-devel check_error "FAILED: YUM INSTALL" echo "yum install --DONE"
# Tell curl to allow unvalidated certs. We are using # the rc file instead of -k because of environment issues. # (depends on the HOME export above) echo 'insecure' >> ~/.curlrc echo "proxy=$http_proxy" >> ~/.curlrc
curl -L get.rvm.io | bash -s stable check_error "FAILED: CURL GET.RVM" echo "cure get.rvm.io --DONE"
# Create the railsuser and add it to the rvm group echo "Creating the railsuser account" /usr/sbin/adduser -G root,rvm railsuser check_error "FAILED: CREATING RAIL USERS." echo '[[ -s "/usr/local/rvm/scripts/rvm" ]] && . "/usr/local/rvm/scripts/rvm"' >> ~railsuser/.bashrc echo "creating rail users --DONE"
# Output the set of commands to a file to be run as the railsuser cat > runfile <<EOF #!/bin/bash
# import global setting . $global_conf
export RUBY_VERSION=$RUBY_VERSION export RAILS_VERSION=$RAILS_VERSION
function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
echo 'insecure' >> ~/.curlrc echo "proxy=$http_proxy" >> ~/.curlrc
# Source RVM . /usr/local/rvm/scripts/rvm
# Tell RVM to install Ruby echo "Creating a gemset and installing Ruby $RUBY_VERSION in it" rvm --install --default use $RUBY_VERSION@appdirector-gemset --create check_error "FAILED: RVM INSTALL RUBY" echo "rvm install ruby --DONE"
# Only set errexit *after* running RVM because it's not prepared for it set -e
# Install Rails (and all dependencies) echo "Installing Rails $RAILS_VERSION" gem install rails -v $RAILS_VERSION check_error "FAILED: GEM INSTALL RAILS $RAILS_VERSION" echo "gem install rails --DONE"
# Install Passenger/mod_rails gem echo "Installing Passenger gem" gem install passenger check_error "FAILED: GEM INSTALL PASSENGER" echo "gem install passenger --DONE"
EOF
# Prepar the file to be run as the railsuser cp runfile /home/railsuser/runfile chown -R railsuser:railsuser /home/railsuser chmod 755 /home/railsuser/runfile
# Run the script as the railsuser to install Ruby and Rails su -c /home/railsuser/runfile - railsuser
# Install Passenger/mod_rails Apache module as the railsuser echo "Installing Passenger Apache module" rubminor=`ls -ad /usr/local/rvm/gems/ruby-$RUBY_VERSION-*appdirector-gemset | cut -d '-' -f3 | cut -d '@' -f1`
# Ruby installer doesn't like the the newline entered like this for generating enter keypress but still looks to complete fine su - railsuser -c "/usr/local/rvm/gems/ruby-$RUBY_VERSION-$rubminor@appdirector-gemset/bin/passenger-install-apache2-module --auto"
# Configure Apache module # Add a statement to load the Passenger module echo "Adding the LoadModule directive to the httpd.conf file" passengerver=`ls -ad /usr/local/rvm/gems/ruby-$RUBY_VERSION-$rubminor@appdirector-gemset/gems/passenger-* | cut -d '-' -f5` sed -i.bak "/LoadModule version_module/ a LoadModule passenger_module /usr/local/rvm/gems/ruby-$RUBY_VERSION-$rubminor@appdirector-gemset/gems/passenger-$passengerver/ext/apache2/mod_passenger.so" /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf
# Add the Passenger/mod_rails config to the httpd.conf file echo "Adding the Passenger config to the httpd.conf file" cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf <<APACHE
# # Passenger/mod_rails config PassengerRoot /usr/local/rvm/gems/ruby-$RUBY_VERSION-$rubminor@appdirector-gemset/gems/passenger-$passengerver PassengerRuby /usr/local/rvm/wrappers/ruby-$RUBY_VERSION-$rubminor@appdirector-gemset/ruby
APACHE
# Restart Apache echo "Restarting Apache httpd" service httpd restart
# Cleanup the runfile from the railsuser's home dir echo "Removing the runfile script" rm /home/railsuser/runfile

ns9:component-version-script.description: Script to install WebSphere Application Service
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
# IMPORT GLOBAL CONF . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin/ export PATH=$PATH:/usr/sbin/ export PATH=$PATH:/sbin
#########CUSTOMIZED PARAMETERS######### INSTALL_BASE="$install_base" INSTALL_EDITION_ARRAY=(BASE BASETRIAL EXPRESS EXPRESSTRIAL DEVELOPERS NETWORKDEPLOYMENT)
#########PARAMTERS FROM APP DIRECTOR######### IM_DOWNLOAD_URL="$im_download_url" REPOSITORY_URL="$repository_url" INSTALL_EDITION="$install_edition" IBM_USERNAME="$ibm_username" IBM_PASSWORD="$ibm_password" PROFILE_NAME="$profile_name" NODE_NAME="$node_name" SERVER_NAME="$server_name" ADMIN_USERNAME="$admin_username" ADMIN_PASSWORD="$admin_password" PROXY_HOST="$proxy_host" PROXY_PORT="$proxy_port" PROXY_USERNAME="$proxy_username" PROXY_PASSWORD="$proxy_password"
#########SCRIPT INTERNAL PARAMETERS######### INSTALL_LOCATION="$INSTALL_BASE/WebSphere/AppServer" SHARED_REPOSITORY="$INSTALL_BASE/IMShared" WSINSTALLERLOCATION="$INSTALL_BASE/wsinstaller" INSTALLATIONLOG="$INSTALL_BASE/installationlogs" KEYRINGLOCATION="$INSTALL_BASE/keyring.txt" RESPONSE_XML="$INSTALL_BASE/install_was_response.xml" OFFERING_ID="";
###########PARAMTER VALIDATION FUNCTIONS################## ## FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
function check_install_edition() { len=${#INSTALL_EDITION_ARRAY[*]} local temp=$1; for (( i=0; $i < $len; i++ )) do if [ "${INSTALL_EDITION_ARRAY[$i]}" = "$temp" ]; then return; fi done error_exit "INVALID EDITION" }
####################SCRIPT EXECUTION ################## echo "PARAMTER VALIDATION"
if [ "x${PROFILE_NAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "PROFILE_NAME NOT SET." fi
if [ "x${INSTALL_BASE}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "INSTALL_BASE NOT SET." fi
if [ "x${NODE_NAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "NODE_NAME NOT SET." fi
if [ "x${SERVER_NAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "SERVER_NAME NOT SET." fi
if [ "x${ADMIN_USERNAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ADMIN_USERNAME NOT SET." fi
if [ "x${ADMIN_PASSWORD}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ADMIN_PASSWORD NOT SET." fi
if [ "x${INSTALL_EDITION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "INSTALL_EDITION NOT SET." else check_install_edition $INSTALL_EDITION; fi
if [ "x${PROXY_USERNAME}" != "x" && "x${PROXY_PASSWORD}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "PROXY_PASSWORD NOT SET." fi
if [ "x${REPOSITORY_URL}" = "x" ]; then if [ $INSTALL_EDITION = "BASE" ]; then REPOSITORY_URL="http://www.ibm.com/software/repositorymanager/com.ibm.websphere.BASE.v80 " elif [ $INSTALL_EDITION = "BASETRIAL" ]; then REPOSITORY_URL="http://www.ibm.com/software/repositorymanager/V8WASBASETrial" elif [ $INSTALL_EDITION = "EXPRESS" ]; then REPOSITORY_URL="http://www.ibm.com/software/repositorymanager/com.ibm.websphere.EXPRESS.v80" elif [ $INSTALL_EDITION = "EXPRESSTRIAL" ]; then REPOSITORY_URL="http://www.ibm.com/software/repositorymanager/V8WASEXPRESSTrial" elif [ $INSTALL_EDITION = "DEVELOPERS" ]; then REPOSITORY_URL="http://www.ibm.com/software/repositorymanager/com.ibm.websphere.DEVELOPERS.v80" elif [ $INSTALL_EDITION = "NETWORKDEPLOYMENT" ]; then REPOSITORY_URL="http://www.ibm.com/software/repositorymanager/com.ibm.websphere.NDTRIAL.v80" fi fi
if [ $INSTALL_EDITION = "BASE" ]; then OFFERING_ID="com.ibm.websphere.BASE.v80" elif [ $INSTALL_EDITION = "BASETRIAL" ]; then OFFERING_ID="com.ibm.websphere.BASETRIAL.v80" elif [ $INSTALL_EDITION = "EXPRESS" ]; then OFFERING_ID="com.ibm.websphere.EXPRESS.v80" elif [ $INSTALL_EDITION = "EXPRESSTRIAL" ]; then OFFERING_ID="com.ibm.websphere.EXPRESSTRIAL.v80" elif [ $INSTALL_EDITION = "DEVELOPERS" ]; then OFFERING_ID="com.ibm.websphere.DEVELOPERS.v80" elif [ $INSTALL_EDITION = "NETWORKDEPLOYMENT" ]; then OFFERING_ID="com.ibm.websphere.NDTRIAL.v80" fi
mkdir -p $WSINSTALLERLOCATION touch $INSTALLATIONLOG
echo "DOWNLOADING INSTALLATION MANAGER INSTALLER" wget --output-document=$WSINSTALLERLOCATION/IBMIM_linux_x86.zip $IM_DOWNLOAD_URL check_error "ERRORS DURING MOUNTING INSTALLATION MANAGER INSTALLER.";
#START CHECKING OS TYPE
KERNEL=`uname -r` MACH=`uname -m`
if [ -f /etc/redhat-release ] ; then BASEARCH=`uname -p` DISTROBASEDON='RedHat' DIST=`cat /etc/redhat-release |sed s/\ release.*//` if [ "$DIST" = "CentOS" ] ; then echo "CentOS..............." yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install unzip yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install libgcc_s.so.1 libstdc++.so.6 else if [ "$BASEARCH" = "i686" ] ; then echo "32 BIT MACHINE" yum -y update yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install PackageKit-gtk-module.i686 libcanberra-gtk2.i686 else echo "64 BIT MACHINE" wget http://fr2.rpmfind.net/linux/centos/6.1/os/x86_64/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6 rpm --import RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6 yum -y update yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install PackageKit-gtk-module.i686 PackageKit-gtk-module.x86_64 libcanberra-gtk2.x86_64 libcanberra-gtk2.i686 fi yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install unzip fi echo "UPDATING PRE-REQUISTE PACKAGES -- DONE"
elif [ -f /etc/SuSE-release ] ; then echo $DISTROBASEDON zypper rr repo-oss zypper ar -f http://download.opensuse.org/distribution/11.2/repo/oss/ repo-oss zypper --non-interactive --no-gpg-checks ref zypper --non-interactive --no-gpg-checks install unzip zypper --non-interactive --no-gpg-checks install libgcc_s.so.1 libstdc++.so.6
else apt-get -f -y upgrade apt-get -y update apt-get install -y linux-firmware < /dev/console > /dev/console apt-get -f -y install ia32-libs apt-get -f -y install # INSTALL UNZIP PACKAGE TYPE_MATCH=`uname -m` if [ $TYPE_MATCH == "i686" ] ; then echo "32 BIT MACHINE" wget http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/u/unzip/unzip_6.0-4_i386.deb sudo dpkg -i unzip_6.0-4_i386.deb else echo "64 BIT MACHINE" wget http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/u/unzip/unzip_6.0-4ubuntu1_amd64.deb sudo dpkg -i unzip_6.0-4ubuntu1_amd64.deb fi fi
# UNZIP echo "EXTRACTING INSTALLATION MANAGER INSTALLER" unzip -q $WSINSTALLERLOCATION/IBMIM_linux_x86.zip -d $WSINSTALLERLOCATION check_error "ERRORS DURING EXTRACTING INSTALLATION MANAGER INSTALLER."; echo "EXTRACTING INSTALLATION MANAGER INSTALLER -- DONE"
# INSTALLING IBM INSTALL MANAGER echo "INSTALLING IBM INSTALL MANAGER" cd $WSINSTALLERLOCATION ./installc -acceptLicense check_error "ERRORS DURING INSTALLATION MANAGER INSTALLATION.";
echo "MODIFYING THE RESPONSE FILE" # CREATE THE RESPONSE FILE HERE touch $RESPONSE_XML chmod 777 $RESPONSE_XML echo "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<agent-input acceptLicense='true'>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<server>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<repository location='$REPOSITORY_URL'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "</server>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<profile id='IBM WebSphere Application Server - Express Trial V8.0' installLocation='$INSTALL_LOCATION'>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<data key='eclipseLocation' value='$INSTALL_LOCATION'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<data key='user.import.profile' value='false'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<data key='cic.selector.os' value='linux'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<data key='cic.selector.ws' value='gtk'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<data key='cic.selector.arch' value='x86'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<data key='cic.selector.nl' value='en'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "</profile>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<install modify='false'>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<offering id='$OFFERING_ID' profile='IBM WebSphere Application Server - Express Trial V8.0' installFixes='none'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "</install>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.eclipseCache' value='$SHARED_REPOSITORY'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.connectTimeout' value='30'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.readTimeout' value='45'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.downloadAutoRetryCount' value='0'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='offering.service.repositories.areUsed' value='true'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.ssl.nonsecureMode' value='false'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.http.disablePreemptiveAuthentication' value='false'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='http.ntlm.auth.kind' value='NTLM'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='http.ntlm.auth.enableIntegrated.win32' value='true'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.preserveDownloadedArtifacts' value='true'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.keepFetchedFiles' value='false'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='PassportAdvantageIsEnabled' value='false'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.searchForUpdates' value='false'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.agent.ui.displayInternalVersion' value='false'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.sharedUI.showErrorLog' value='true'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.sharedUI.showWarningLog' value='true'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.sharedUI.showNoteLog' value='true'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.http.proxyEnabled' value='true'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.http.proxyHost' value='$PROXY_HOST'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.http.proxyPort' value='$PROXY_PORT'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.http.proxyUsername' value='$PROXY_USERNAME'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML echo "<preference name='com.ibm.cic.common.core.preferences.http.proxyUserPassword' value='$PROXY_PASSWORD'/>" >> $RESPONSE_XML
echo "</agent-input>" >> $RESPONSE_XML check_error "ERRORS DURING GENERATING RESPONSE XML.";
cd /opt/IBM/InstallationManager/eclipse/tools KEY_COMMAND_OPTS="-userName $IBM_USERNAME -userPassword $IBM_PASSWORD -passportAdvantage -keyring $KEYRINGLOCATION"
if [ "x${PROXY_HOST}" != "x" ]; then KEY_COMMAND_OPTS+=" -proxyHost $PROXY_HOST -proxyPort $PROXY_PORT" if [ "x${PROXY_USERNAME}" != "x" ]; then KEY_COMMAND_OPTS+=" -proxyUsername $PROXY_USERNAME -proxyUserPassword $PROXY_PASSWORD" fi fi
#GENERATING KEY RING echo "GENERATING KEY RING" ./imutilsc saveCredential $KEY_COMMAND_OPTS check_error "ERRORS DURING GENERATING KEY RING.";
# INSTALLING WEBSPEHERE APPLICATION SERVER echo "INSTALLING WEBSPHERE APPLICATION SERVER" check_error "ERRORS DURING INSTALLING APPLICATION SERVER."; ./imcl -acceptLicense -input $RESPONSE_XML -log $INSTALLATIONLOG -keyring $KEYRINGLOCATION

ns9:component-version-script.description: Script to install, configure, and start AppInsight Code Agent
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/sh
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/opt/vmware/bin:/opt/vmware/bin export HOME=/root
#---------------------------------------------------------------------------- # Properites from AppDirector Service #---------------------------------------------------------------------------- APM_IP="$apm_ip" APM_USER="$apm_user" APM_PASS="$apm_pass" INSTALL_PATHS="$install_paths" SERVER_RESTART_1="$server_restart_1"
#Make sure we have cURL available echo "Installing cURL..." if [ -f /usr/bin/curl]; then echo "cURL is missing - trying to install ..."
if [ which yum &> /dev/null]; then echo "Installing cURL with yum (RedHat machine)" yum update -y yum install curl -y fi fi
#Downloads The Agent echo "Downloading code agent..." curl --data "j_username=$APM_USER&j_password=$APM_PASS" https://$APM_IP:8443/am-apm-web/j_spring_security_check --cookie-jar /tmp/cookies.txt -k curl https://$APM_IP:8443/am-apm-web/download/java-agent.jar --cookie /tmp/cookies.txt -k > /tmp/java-agent.jar -v
#Cleanup rm -f /tmp/cookies.txt
#Loop over install paths echo "Installing agent ..." echo "Location count: ${#INSTALL_PATHS[@]}" if [ ! "$INSTALL_PATHS" == "None" ]; then for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#INSTALL_PATHS[@]} ; i++ )); do echo "Installing agent in path: ${INSTALL_PATHS[$i]}" java -jar /tmp/java-agent.jar -n --path ${INSTALL_PATHS[$i]} done fi
#Cleanup rm -f /tmp/java-agent.jar
#Restarting servers echo "Restarting servers..." n=1 while [ 1 ]; do eval "var=\$SERVER_RESTART_$n" if [ ${#var} -gt 0 ]; then echo "Restarting $n ..." eval $var : $((n = $n + 1)) else break fi done
echo "Done!"

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/sh # Import global conf . $global_conf
set -e
mkdir -p $install_path/packages
mv $ers_package $install_path/packages/ers-4.0.3-apache-2.2.17-x86-linux-glibc2.zip.sfx mv $installer $install_path/installer
chmod 755 $install_path/packages/ers-4.0.3-apache-2.2.17-x86-linux-glibc2.zip.sfx chmod 755 $install_path/installer
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/sbin/:/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin
cd $install_path export JAVA_HOME=/usr
KERNEL=`uname -r` MACH=`uname -m` if [ -f /etc/redhat-release ] ; then DistroBasedOn='RedHat' DIST=`cat /etc/redhat-release |sed s/\ release.*//` REV=`cat /etc/redhat-release | sed s/.*release\ // | sed s/\ .*//` elif [ -f /etc/SuSE-release ] ; then DistroBasedOn='SuSe' REV=`cat /etc/SuSE-release | tr "\n" ' ' | sed s/.*=\ //` elif [ -f /etc/debian_version ] ; then DistroBasedOn='Debian' DIST=`cat /etc/lsb-release | grep '^DISTRIB_ID' | awk -F= '{ print $2 }'` REV=`cat /etc/lsb-release | grep '^DISTRIB_RELEASE' | awk -F= '{ print $2 }'` fi
if [ $DistroBasedOn == "Debian" ] ; then if [ $MACH == "x86_64" ] ; then DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive export TERM=linux apt-get -y -f update apt-get -y -f install apt-get -f -y --force-yes install lib32gcc1 libc6-i386 lib32z1 lib32stdc++6 lib32asound2 lib32bz2-1.0 lib32ncurses5 lib32v4l-0 libasound2 libv4l-0 apt-get -f -y --force-yes install ia32-libs ./installer --setup-ers --skip-start else ./installer --setup-ers --skip-start fi elif [ $DistroBasedOn == "RedHat" ] ; then if [ $DIST == "CentOS" ] ; then if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then echo 'SELinux is enabled. This may cause installation to fail.' fi fi yum update -y yum install glibc.i686 -y ./installer --setup-ers --skip-start fi
/usr/sbin/groupadd oinstall /usr/sbin/groupadd ers /usr/sbin/useradd -m -g oinstall -G ers ersuser
sed -i "43cUser ersuser" $install_path/working/ers/servers/instance1/conf/httpsd.conf sed -i "44cGroup ers" $install_path/working/ers/servers/instance1/conf/httpsd.conf sed -i "103cListen $http_port" $install_path/working/ers/servers/instance1/conf/httpsd.conf sed -i "106cServerName localhost:$http_port" $install_path/working/ers/servers/instance1/conf/httpsd.conf cd $install_path/working/ers/servers/instance1/bin ./apache_startup.sh start

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/sh # vFabric ApplicationDirector Sample INSTALL script for vFabric GemFire
# This example uses the values posted below as defaults. To change any of these # values, add the Property Name as shown below as individual properties in your # service definition in the ApplicationDirector Catalog. The value specified after # the Property name is the Type to use for the property (i.e. String, Content, Array etc) # There are two types of properties for this script: Required and Optional. Both are # listed below. # # REQUIRED PROPERTIES: # These are the properties you must add in order for this sample script to work. The property # is added when you create your service definition in the ApplicationDirector Catalog. # Property Description: Property Value settable in blueprint [type]: # -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- # Location of global configuration data global_conf [Content] # value: https://${darwin.server.ip}:8443/darwin/conf/darwin_global.conf # # Version of vFabric Suite release VERSION [String] # value: latest (to get most up to date version), 5.1, 5.2, etc # # If VERSION property is set to anything other then 'latest' then you need to set # REPO_RPM property. # # File name of repository RPM for given version REPO_RPM [String] # value: example = vfabric-5.1-repo-5.1-1.noarch.rpm for 5.1 repo # # OPTIONAL PROPERTIES: # Property Description: Property Name settable in blueprint: # -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- # which java to use JAVA_HOME [String] # Installed Location of GemFire GEMFIRE_HOME [String] # GemFire version installed (default is 663) GEMFIRE_VERSION [String]
# import global configuration data from ApplicationDirector # . $global_conf
set -e
echo "######################################################################" echo "#" echo "# Starting vFabric Gemfire Install Script For Application Director" echo "#" echo "######################################################################"
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/sbin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/bin export VMWARE_HOME=/opt/vmware export GEMFIRE_PACKAGE=vfabric-gemfire export GEMFIRE_VERSION=${GEMFIRE_VERSION:="663"} export GEMFIRE_HOME=${GEMFIRE_HOME:="$VMWARE_HOME/$GEMFIRE_PACKAGE/vFabric_GemFire_$GEMFIRE_VERSION"} export EULA_LOCATION=${EULA_LOCATION:="http://www.vmware.com/download/eula/vfabric_app-platform_eula.html"}
# Any of the following may be set as Properties in your service definition, and if enabled, may be overwritten # in your application blueprint. export JAVA_HOME=${JAVA_HOME:="/usr"}
# pre-set the license agreement for rpm if [ ! -d "/etc/vmware/vfabric" ]; then mkdir -p /etc/vmware/vfabric fi
echo "Setting Up vFabric Suite 5.1 RPM Repo" echo "I_ACCEPT_EULA_LOCATED_AT=${EULA_LOCATION}" >> /etc/vmware/vfabric/accept-vfabric-eula.txt echo "I_ACCEPT_EULA_LOCATED_AT=${EULA_LOCATION}" >> /etc/vmware/vfabric/accept-vfabric5.1-eula.txt
if [ -f /etc/redhat-release ] ; then DistroBasedOn='RedHat' DIST=`cat /etc/redhat-release |sed s/\ release.*//` REV=`cat /etc/redhat-release | sed s/.*release\ // | sed s/\ .*// | awk -F. '{ print $1 }'` else echo "Installation only supported on RedHat; Exiting installation script" exit fi # setup repo if [ -f /bin/rpm ]; then if [ "$REV" == "5" ]; then if [ "$VERSION" == "latest" -o "$VERSION" == "" ]; then export VFABRIC_DATA=`wget -qO- http://repo.vmware.com/pub/rhel${REV}/vfabric/latest` export VERSION=`echo $VFABRIC_DATA | cut -d'|' -f1` export REPO_RPM=`echo $VFABRIC_DATA | cut -d'|' -f2` fi echo "Installing vFabric Suite ${VERSION} EULA" #rpm --import http://repo.vmware.com/pub/rhel${REV}/vfabric/${VERSION}/RPM-GPG-KEY-VFABRIC-${VERSION}-EL${REV} rpm -Uvh --force http://repo.vmware.com/pub/rhel${REV}/vfabric/${VERSION}/${REPO_RPM} elif [ "$REV" == "6" ]; then if [ "$VERSION" == "latest" -o "$VERSION" == "" ]; then export VFABRIC_DATA=`wget -qO- http://repo.vmware.com/pub/rhel${REV}/vfabric/latest` export VERSION=`echo $VFABRIC_DATA | cut -d'|' -f1` export REPO_RPM=`echo $VFABRIC_DATA | cut -d'|' -f2` fi echo "Installing vFabric Suite ${VERSION} EULA" #rpm --import http://repo.vmware.com/pub/rhel${REV}/vfabric/${VERSION}/RPM-GPG-KEY-VFABRIC-${VERSION}-EL${REV} rpm -Uvh --force http://repo.vmware.com/pub/rhel${REV}/vfabric/${VERSION}/${REPO_RPM} else echo "Unsupported RedHat Version: ${REV}; Exiting installation" exit fi else echo "RPM utility not available; Exiting installation script" exit fi
if [ "$DistroBasedOn" == "RedHat" ]; then if [ "$DIST" == "CentOS" ]; then if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then echo 'SELinux is enabled. This may cause installation to fail.' fi fi if [ -f /usr/bin/yum ]; then echo "Installing ${GEMFIRE_PACKAGE}" yum -y -v install ${GEMFIRE_PACKAGE} else echo "ERROR! Unable to locate yum in ${PATH}; Exiting installer" exit fi fi
if [ -f ${GEMFIRE_HOME}/bin/gemfire ]; then echo "SUCCESS: ${GEMFIRE_PACKAGE} has been installed in ${GEMFIRE_HOME}" echo "Please see https://www.vmware.com/support/pubs/vfabric-gemfire.html for more information" else echo "ERROR! GemFire executable not found in ${GEMFIRE_HOME}; Exiting installer" exit fi
echo "######################################################################" echo "#" echo "# vFabric Gemfire Install Script Finished" echo "#" echo "######################################################################"

export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin export HOME=/root
